mapper.update:
UPDATE `mqms_sales_raw` SET
`vin_code` = #{set.vinCode},
`sales_car_type` = #{set.salesCarType},
`sales_car_type_detail` = #{set.salesCarTypeDetail},
`sales_car_type_cn` = #{set.salesCarTypeCn},
`dealer_code` = #{set.dealerCode},
`dealer_name` = #{set.dealerName},
`produce_date` = #{set.produceDate},
`first_pin_date` = #{set.firstPinDate},
`second_pin_date` = #{set.secondPinDate},
`state` = #{set.state},
`applier_id` = #{set.applierId},
`applier_name` = #{set.applierName},
`apply_time` = #{set.applyTime},
`sales_id` in
#{item} and
`sales_id` >= #{where.salesIdSt} and
`sales_id` <= #{where.salesIdEd} and
`vin_code` in
#{item} and
(
`Vin_code` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Vin_code` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sales_car_type` in
#{item} and
(
`Sales_car_type` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sales_car_type` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sales_car_type_detail` in
#{item} and
(
`Sales_car_type_detail` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sales_car_type_detail` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`sales_car_type_cn` in
#{item} and
(
`Sales_car_type_cn` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Sales_car_type_cn` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`dealer_code` in
#{item} and
(
`Dealer_code` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Dealer_code` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`dealer_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Dealer_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Dealer_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`produce_date` in
#{item} and
(
`Produce_date` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Produce_date` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`first_pin_date` in
#{item} and
(
`First_pin_date` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`First_pin_date` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`second_pin_date` in
#{item} and
(
`Second_pin_date` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Second_pin_date` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`state` in
#{item} and
(
`State` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`State` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`applier_id` in
#{item} and
`applier_id` >= #{where.applierIdSt} and
`applier_id` <= #{where.applierIdEd} and
`applier_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Applier_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Applier_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`apply_time` in
#{item} and
(
`Apply_time` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Apply_time` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
